descriptions.content: rims bsrung, rims ‘gog, yams ‘gogs, yams bsrung [It remains to be seen which of these are medicinal and which are religious rituals.] Ex: Rims bsrung dgu sbyor (W17787), ‘Gos gnad yams rims kun thub (W19098), Gsang ye'i le lag las nad yams bsrung bsrad kyi man ngag rig 'dzin lugs bzang (W9271).
